text: @FLOTUS I'll reflect back to pre-Nov. 2016 when America was still a great place to live. Pre-corona, pre-hate-filled nation, pre-TRUMP! #TrumpRuinedAmerica #4thofJuly2020 #CoronavirusPandemic #TrumpDeathToll131K+ #Merica #FvckTheFourth https://t.co/msfWQcqSoA
